Text: I haven't tried this torrent yet, but I just want provide a word of warning, from someone who uses Deepfreeze a lot. If you have nVidia chipsets do not use Deepfreeze they haven't perfected it for those chipsets yet. If you want to try anyway make sure you take an image of your drive before hand.

iv tried dis df out and it has time limit on it man dis is no good unless u can tell me otherwise then yeah halaaa its a waste of time seeding  it i do need one for vista im using df 5.30 only for xp but if you can tell me how to take the time limit off then that will be great.
